title: Prime Minister of France - Wikipedia
snippet: If so, the president may serve as both the head of state and de facto head of government, while the prime minister serves as his deputy, acting as a link between the legislature and the executive. title: French PM wins crucial budget vote
snippet: Lecornu is Macron's fourth prime minister since then – the two previous incumbents Michel Barnier and François Bayrou were both forced to resign after trying to rein in France's burgeoning debt.

title: Emmanuel Macron - Wikipedia
